name: Master Weapons
description:
§l§nMaster Weapons§r
 §oA mod that adds overpowered items.§r

§lFeatures§r
 * Master sword, axe, pickaxe, shovel and hoe
 * Master ingot and nugget.
 * Master block and ore.
 * Recipes for tools, sword, ingot, nugget and block.
 * Infinite damage.
 * Ore generation (has 1 ore in 64 chunks).

§lSource code§r
 The source code is on github: https://github.com/XyperCode/master-weapons
